<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add Items to a Dashboard List</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v2/dashboard/lists/manual/{dashboard_list_id}/dashboards"}></MethodEndpoint>


Add dashboards to an existing dashboard list.
## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the dashboard list to add items to.","in":"path","name":"dashboard_list_id","required":true,"schema":{"format":"int64","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>
<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div className={"body-description-container"}><div className={"body-description"}>Dashboards to add to the dashboard list.</div></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"5px"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>dashboards</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"5px"}} className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>List of dashboards to add the dashboard list.</div><li className={"opening-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"opening-array-bracket"}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ID of the dashboard.","example":"q5j-nti-fv6","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={true} schemaName={"DashboardType"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`custom_timeboard`, `custom_screenboard`, `integration_screenboard`, `integration_timeboard`, `host_timeboard`]"} schema={{"description":"The type of the dashboard.","enum":["custom_timeboard","custom_screenboard","integration_screenboard","integration_timeboard","host_timeboard"],"example":"host_timeboard","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["CUSTOM_TIMEBOARD","CUSTOM_SCREENBOARD","INTEGRATION_SCREENBOARD","INTEGRATION_TIMEBOARD","HOST_TIMEBOARD"],"title":"DashboardType"}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
